resources.string: Usually, weapons made out of such soft metal as gold won\'t be considered more than decoration. Despite that, this blade seems to be able to cut through things pretty well.

It\'s truly hard to believe that, this magnificent statue isn\'t just another decoration, but a malicious creature waiting for an unsuspecting adventurer. At first glance you could\'ve sworn that it\'s _%s_ was just part of it\'s arm.
This middle aged man seems to be mildly annoyed and excited at the same time. He wears a composite armor made out of held together bone fragments.

Ah! It is such a rare sight! A fellow adventurer who is not just a lifeless corpse. Hardly believable! Oh... I beg my pardon, sometimes I get too excited. You see, I myself, am a necromancer. And even though, studying the dead and death itself is what I do for a living, seeing same things over and over again, eventually gets extremely exhausting. On the other hand that\'s exactly why I am here. According to my calculations, in just a couple of weeks, somewhere in this very dungeon, something spectacular is going to happen. The _Necropolis_, an ancient city of the dead is going to open it\'s doors. And... I can\'t really say to much, I wasted enough time as it is. I need to get ready, _come back later_.
So little time, so little time...
I can hear the call of the dead.
Something special is hidden inside the Necropolis.
